oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let M be a Hadamard manifold of dimension 3 whose sectional curvature satisfies -b(2)<= K <=-a(2)< 0 and whose curvature tensor satisfies parallel to del R parallel to <= C for suitable constants 0 < a <= b and C >= 0. We show that M is of constant sectional curvature provided M is asymptotically harmonic. This was previously only known if M admits a compact quotient.
